mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM notice WHERE notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}

SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, notice.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE notice_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY notice_idx DESC ) notice ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARD.* FROM ( SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM notice WHERE
(notice_idx LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_title LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_content LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_regdate LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_status LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_viewcnt LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%')
1=1
ORDER BY notice_idx DESC ) BOARD ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM notice WHERE
(notice_idx LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_title LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_content LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_regdate LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_status LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%' OR notice_viewcnt LIKE '%' || #{selectKeyword} || '%')
1=1
)
